alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Trout River; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 2:47PM EST until December 26 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM SATURDAY TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY EVENING THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... ...WIND ADVISORY IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 20 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 possible. * WHERE...Bradford, Coastal Nassau, Eastern Clay, Eastern Alachua, Trout River, Western Clay, Western Alachua and Western Duval Counties. * WHEN...For the first Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 11 AM EST Saturday. For the second Hard Freeze Warning, from 8 PM Saturday to 9 AM EST Sunday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Sunday evening through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bradford; Coastal Nassau; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Trout River; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval
